translations: v.打击；用布擦（clout 的过去分词）

sentences.sentence: He clouted the ball into the south stands.
sentences.translation: 他把球打到南边的看台上去。

sentences.sentence: And old shoes and clouted upon their feet, and old garments upon them; and all the bread of their provision was dry and mouldy.
sentences.translation: 将补过的旧鞋穿在脚上，把旧衣服穿在身上。他们所带的饼都是干的，长了霉了。
